Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.ui.swing

Class SimpleWizard<Common,​ErrorType extends java.lang.Enum<?>>

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
java.awt.Window
java.awt.Dialog
javax.swing.JDialog
chav1961.purelib.ui.swing.SimpleWizard<Common,​ErrorType>
Type Parameters:
Common - data type for the information shared with all the WizardStep instances (usually some descriptor to fill with wizard)
ErrorType - type of the errors can be detected on the wizard execution stages
All Implemented Interfaces:
ErrorProcessing<Common,​ErrorType>, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class SimpleWizard<Common,​ErrorType extends java.lang.Enum<?>>
extends javax.swing.JDialog
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable, ErrorProcessing<Common,​ErrorType>

This class is a swing-oriented simple wizard to use with the WizardStep implementations. The class extends JDialog functionality and can be used in the similar way. The class implements AutoCloseable interface and would be used in the try-with-resource statements. The class is fully compatible with the WizardStep contract and supports WizardStep lifeCycle as described. Advanced options for this class are:

  • automatic localization support (see Localizer)
  • ability to show Language selection drop-down in the wizard.

To prevent unpedictable changes in the life WizardStep's cycle, protected method animate(int, Object, BlockingQueue) in the class is marked as final.

This class is not thread-safe

Since:
0.0.2
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
See Also:
WizardStep, JUnit tests, Serialized Form
LastUpdate:
0.0.4
